EmailTemplate.name: RFQ-Block 10
EmailTemplate.subject: RFQ
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for your interest in TE Connectivity. Your account is currently set up for the purchasing of tooling and machine parts. I have included a link below that will provide a complete list of the TE authorized distributors that you can work with regarding the part(s) in question. Please let me know if you need any additional information. Thank you.
Rebecca
https://www.te.com/wheretobuylookup/wtbuy_main_dist_inv.asp
